Judge<S>2919</S> not<S>3361</S>, that<S>3363</S> ye be<S>2919</S> not<S>3363</S> judged<S>2919</S>.
For<S>1722</S> with<S>3739</S> what<S>1063</S> judgment<S>2917</S> ye judge<S>2919</S>, ye shall be judged<S>2919</S>: and<S>2532</S> with<S>1722</S> what<S>3739</S> measure<S>3358</S> ye mete<S>3354</S>, it shall be measured<S>488</S> to you<S>5213</S> again<S>488</S>.
And<S>1161</S> why<S>5101</S> beholdest<S>991</S> thou the mote<S>2595</S> that is in<S>1722</S> thy<S>4675</S> brother's<S>80</S> eye<S>3788</S>, but<S>1161</S> considerest<S>2657</S> not<S>3756</S> the beam<S>1385</S> that is in<S>1722</S> thine own<S>4674</S> eye<S>3788</S>?
Or<S>2228</S> how<S>4459</S> wilt thou say<S>2046</S> to thy<S>4675</S> brother<S>80</S>, Let<S>863</S> me pull out<S>1544</S> the mote<S>2595</S> out of<S>575</S> thine<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S>; and<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, a beam<S>1385</S> is in<S>1722</S> thine own<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S>?
Thou hypocrite<S>5273</S>, first<S>4412</S> cast out<S>1544</S> the beam<S>1385</S> out of<S>1537</S> thine own<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S>; and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shalt thou see clearly<S>1227</S> to cast out<S>1544</S> the mote<S>2595</S> out of<S>1537</S> thy<S>4675</S> brother's<S>80</S> eye<S>3788</S>.
Give<S>1325</S> not<S>3361</S> that which<S>3588</S> is holy<S>40</S> unto the dogs<S>2965</S>, neither<S>3366</S> cast<S>906</S> ye your<S>5216</S> pearls<S>3135</S> before<S>1715</S> swine<S>5519</S>, lest<S>3379</S> they trample<S>2662</S> them<S>846</S> under<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> turn again<S>4762</S> and rend<S>4486</S> you<S>5209</S>.
Ask<S>154</S>, and<S>2532</S> it shall be given<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S>; seek<S>2212</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye shall find<S>2147</S>; knock<S>2925</S>, and<S>2532</S> it shall be opened<S>455</S> unto you<S>5213</S>:
For<S>1063</S> every one<S>3956</S> that asketh<S>154</S> receiveth<S>2983</S>; and<S>2532</S> he that seeketh<S>2212</S> findeth<S>2147</S>; and<S>2532</S> to him that knocketh<S>2925</S> it shall be opened<S>455</S>.
Or<S>2228</S> what<S>5101</S> man<S>444</S> is<S>2076</S> there of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S>, whom<S>3739</S> if<S>1437</S> his<S>846</S> son<S>5207</S> ask<S>154</S> bread<S>740</S>, will he give<S>3361</S> <S>1929</S> him<S>846</S> a stone<S>3037</S>?
Or<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> he ask<S>154</S> a fish<S>2486</S>, will he give<S>3361</S> <S>1929</S> him<S>846</S> a serpent<S>3789</S>?
If<S>1487</S> ye<S>5210</S> then<S>3767</S>, being<S>5607</S> evil<S>4190</S>, know<S>1492</S> how to give<S>1325</S> good<S>18</S> gifts<S>1390</S> unto your<S>5216</S> children<S>5043</S>, how much<S>4214</S> more<S>3123</S> shall your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> give<S>1325</S> good things<S>18</S> to them that ask<S>154</S> him<S>846</S>?
Therefore<S>3767</S> all things<S>3956</S> whatsoever<S>302</S> <S>3745</S> ye would<S>2309</S> that<S>2443</S> men<S>444</S> should do<S>4160</S> to you<S>5213</S>, do<S>4160</S> ye<S>5210</S> even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> to them<S>846</S>: for<S>1063</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the law<S>3551</S> and<S>2532</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>.
Enter ye in<S>1525</S> at<S>1223</S> the strait<S>4728</S> gate<S>4439</S>: for<S>3754</S> wide<S>4116</S> is the gate<S>4439</S>, and<S>2532</S> broad<S>2149</S> is the way<S>3598</S>, that leadeth<S>520</S> to<S>1519</S> destruction<S>684</S>, and<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> there be<S>1526</S> which<S>3588</S> go in<S>1525</S> thereat<S>1223</S> <S>846</S>: <sup>strait: or, narrow</sup>
Because<S>3754</S> strait<S>4728</S> is the gate<S>4439</S>, and<S>2532</S> narrow<S>2346</S> is the way<S>3598</S>, which<S>3588</S> leadeth<S>520</S> unto<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> few<S>3641</S> there be<S>1526</S> that find<S>2147</S> it<S>846</S>. <sup>Because: or, How</sup>
Beware<S>1161</S> <S>4337</S> of<S>575</S> false prophets<S>5578</S>, which<S>3748</S> come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> sheep's<S>4263</S> clothing<S>1742</S>, but<S>1161</S> inwardly<S>2081</S> they are<S>1526</S> ravening<S>727</S> wolves<S>3074</S>.
Ye shall know<S>1921</S> them<S>846</S> by<S>575</S> their<S>846</S> fruits<S>2590</S> <S>3385</S>. Do men gather<S>4816</S> grapes<S>4718</S> of<S>575</S> thorns<S>173</S>, or<S>2228</S> figs<S>4810</S> of<S>575</S> thistles<S>5146</S>?
Even so<S>3779</S> every<S>3956</S> good<S>18</S> tree<S>1186</S> bringeth forth<S>4160</S> good<S>2570</S> fruit<S>2590</S>; but<S>1161</S> a corrupt<S>4550</S> tree<S>1186</S> bringeth forth<S>4160</S> evil<S>4190</S> fruit<S>2590</S>.
A good<S>18</S> tree<S>1186</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> bring forth<S>4160</S> evil<S>4190</S> fruit<S>2590</S>, neither<S>3761</S> can a corrupt<S>4550</S> tree<S>1186</S> bring forth<S>4160</S> good<S>2570</S> fruit<S>2590</S>.
Every<S>3956</S> tree<S>1186</S> that bringeth<S>4160</S> not<S>3361</S> forth<S>4160</S> good<S>2570</S> fruit<S>2590</S> is hewn down<S>1581</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the fire<S>4442</S>.
Wherefore<S>686</S> by<S>575</S> their<S>846</S> fruits<S>2590</S> ye shall know<S>1921</S> them<S>846</S>.
Not<S>3756</S> every one<S>3956</S> that saith<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, shall enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>; but<S>235</S> he that doeth<S>4160</S> the will<S>2307</S> of my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> which is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Many<S>4183</S> will say<S>2046</S> to me<S>3427</S> in<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, have we<S>4395</S> not<S>3756</S> prophesied<S>4395</S> in thy<S>4674</S> name<S>3686</S>? and<S>2532</S> in thy<S>4674</S> name<S>3686</S> have cast out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S>? and<S>2532</S> in thy<S>4674</S> name<S>3686</S> done<S>4160</S> many<S>4183</S> wonderful works<S>1411</S>?
And<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> will I profess<S>3670</S> unto them<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> I never<S>3763</S> knew<S>1097</S> you<S>5209</S>: depart<S>672</S> from<S>575</S> me<S>1700</S>, ye that work<S>2038</S> iniquity<S>458</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> <S>3748</S> heareth<S>191</S> these<S>5128</S> sayings<S>3056</S> of mine<S>3450</S>, and<S>2532</S> doeth<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S>, I will liken<S>3666</S> him<S>846</S> unto a wise<S>5429</S> man<S>435</S>, which<S>3748</S> built<S>3618</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S> upon<S>1909</S> a rock<S>4073</S>:
And<S>2532</S> the rain<S>1028</S> descended<S>2597</S>, and<S>2532</S> the floods<S>4215</S> came<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> the winds<S>417</S> blew<S>4154</S>, and<S>2532</S> beat upon<S>4363</S> that<S>1565</S> house<S>3614</S>; and<S>2532</S> it fell<S>4098</S> not<S>3756</S>: for<S>1063</S> it was founded<S>2311</S> upon<S>1909</S> a rock<S>4073</S>.
And<S>2532</S> every one<S>3956</S> that heareth<S>191</S> these<S>5128</S> sayings<S>3056</S> of mine<S>3450</S>, and<S>2532</S> doeth<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S> not<S>3361</S>, shall be likened<S>3666</S> unto a foolish<S>3474</S> man<S>435</S>, which<S>3748</S> built<S>3618</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S> upon<S>1909</S> the sand<S>285</S>:
And<S>2532</S> the rain<S>1028</S> descended<S>2597</S>, and<S>2532</S> the floods<S>4215</S> came<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> the winds<S>417</S> blew<S>4154</S>, and<S>2532</S> beat upon<S>4350</S> that<S>1565</S> house<S>3614</S>; and<S>2532</S> it fell<S>4098</S>: and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> was<S>2258</S> the fall<S>4431</S> of it<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, when<S>3753</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had ended<S>4931</S> these<S>5128</S> sayings<S>3056</S>, the people<S>3793</S> were astonished<S>1605</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>:
For<S>1063</S> he taught<S>1321</S> <S>2258</S> them<S>846</S> as<S>5613</S> one having<S>2192</S> authority<S>1849</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> the scribes<S>1122</S>.
